name: The Archeoligist
description:
The Archeoligist
You play as an Archeoligist in a point and click adventure.

---------------------------------------------------

Made in 72-hours for the Ludum Dare Compo by Mikkel Mouridsen, Emil Lind, Peder Hundebøl and Albert Haaksema.


Written in C#(unity)

Tools:
Unity
Visual Studio
Pyxel Edit
Photoshop
Audacity

---------------------------------------------------

The game should be played in fullscreen(16:9).
